llmConfig.prompt:
Analyze this sales conversation and provide:
1. Key objections raised
2. Opportunities missed
3. Suggested follow-up actions
4. Overall effectiveness score (1-10)

Do not fill in any gaps. If data is missing, say so.

Transcript: {transcript}

contentMappings.content: Focus on value and ROI. Ask: 'What would it cost your business if this problem isn't solved?' Highlight payment plans if available.
Acknowledge their research. Focus on our unique differentiators: 24/7 support, no setup fees, 99.9% uptime SLA.
Great question! Most clients see value within 30 days. We can start implementation this week. What timeline works best for you?
We have a dedicated implementation team. Average setup time is 2-3 hours with full support. We also offer done-for-you setup.
Suggest: 'Would it be helpful if I prepared a one-page summary for your team? I can highlight the key benefits and ROI.'
